channel.title: CVE Feed for wpkube -- Social Sharing Plugin – Kiwi
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpkube -- Social Sharing Plugin – Kiwi

item.title: CVE-2024-3228|2024-07-10T16:30:32.340Z -- wpkube -- social%20sharing%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20kiwi
item.description: The Social Sharing Plugin – Kiwi plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.7 via the 'kiwi-nw-pinterest' class. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view limited content from password protected posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-3228|2024-07-09T08:33:07.717Z -- wpkube -- social%20sharing%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20kiwi
item.description: The Social Sharing Plugin – Kiwi plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.7 via the 'kiwi-nw-pinterest' class. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view limited content from password protected posts.
